alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 18 at 2:49AM EST until December 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Western Norfolk, Northern Bristol and Western Plymouth Counties. In Rhode Island, Northwest Providence and Western Kent Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
